pages.text: O-Mountain Goats (O-Goat) drop chevon, goat horns and wool, and can be milked for goat milk. They can be carpeted and can carry chests, along with being able to climb up to 2 blocks vertically and walk atop powdered snow without falling in. They’re also strong enough to carry a player, but can’t be controlled.

pages.name: The O-Goat
pages.text: A white, male goat. Goats cannot have markings.
